headline: Mechanical & Electromechanical Locks Market Insights Report 2025-2030 Featuring Prominent Vendors - Allegion, ASSA ABLOY, Fortune Brands Innovations, dormakaba Group, and HONEYWELL
summary: The global mechanical and electromechanical locks market is anticipated to expand at a CAGR of 4.89% from 2024 to 2030, driven by industrial and commercial sector growth and a booming hospitality industry. Allegion plc's acquisition of Nova Hardware and Fortune Brands Innovation's fresh smart lock lines signify key developments shaping the market landscape.
